subject: Fix tab wiring for global selectedCell model
body:
- StyleTab: Remove toggle-to-null handlers, null guards, deselect buttons,
  and overview sections since selectedCell is always valid (never null)
- ContentTab: Add lower bound check for activeCell clamping
- MediaTab: Accept selectedCell prop, auto-select image assigned to the
  globally selected cell when cell changes
- Fix extra closing div in StyleTab Spacing section

https://claude.ai/code/session_019YL8HqtDyFThqCbsD6PaYo
title: Fix tab wiring for global selectedCell model
